name: Exony Demo
description:
The Exony Demo is here!
For a limited time, you can try the first 20 minutes of Exony for free: simply download the file below and extract it wherever you wish.

Exony is a JRPG in the style of the Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest games published for the NES. You'll enter a fantasy world full of magic, monsters and political intrigue. The game is designed with old fashioned design in mind - if you don't like difficult, grindy retro RPGs, then please look elsewhere.

This game contains miold violent and sexual themes, as well as strong language.

CONTROLS:

MOVE - WASD

INTERRACT - ENTER, SPACE, E

BACK, MENU - X, ESC

SCROLL MENUS - ARROW KEYS

RUN - SHIFT
